cause.description:
Left untreated, celiac disease can lead to several complications:
* Malnutrition. * Loss of calcium and bone density. * Lactose intolerance. * Cancer. * Neurological complications.
1. It can occur at any age and has no cure
2. Many times, the disease emerges after some form of trauma
3. The disorder resembles several other conditions that can cause malabsorption
cause.mission: Relaying the importance of proper labeling and the dangers of cross contamination
cause.name: Celiac Disease Awareness
